app_kvServer

Class KVServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • app_kvServer.KVServer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    app_KVServer

    public class KVServer
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ServerState state 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KVServer() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getID() 
      void initKVServer(Metadata metadata, int cacheSize, java.lang.String displacementStrategy)
      Initialize the KVServer with the meta­data, it’s local cache size, and the cache displacement strategy, and block it for client requests, i.e., all client requests are rejected with an SERVER_STOPPED error message; ECS requests have to be processed.
      void lockWrite()
      Lock the KVServer for write operations.
      void run(int port)
      Initializes and starts the server.
      void setMetadata(Metadata metadata) 
      void shutDown()
      Exits the KVServer application.
      void start()
      Starts the KVServer, all client requests and all ECS requests are processed.
      void stop()
      Stops the KVServer, all client requests are rejected and only ECS requests are processed.
      void unLockWrite()
      Unlock the KVServer for write operations.
      void update(Metadata metadata)
      Update the metadata repository of this server

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • state

        public static volatile ServerState state

    • Constructor Detail

      • KVServer

        public KVServer()

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run(int port)
        Initializes and starts the server. Loops until the the server should be closed.

      • initKVServer

        public void initKVServer(Metadata metadata,
                         int cacheSize,
                         java.lang.String displacementStrategy)
        Initialize the KVServer with the meta­data, it’s local cache size, and the cache displacement strategy, and block it for client requests, i.e., all client requests are rejected with an SERVER_STOPPED error message; ECS requests have to be processed.

      • start

        public void start()
        Starts the KVServer, all client requests and all ECS requests are processed.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops the KVServer, all client requests are rejected and only ECS requests are processed.

      • shutDown

        public void shutDown()
        Exits the KVServer application.

      • lockWrite

        public void lockWrite()
        Lock the KVServer for write operations.

      • unLockWrite

        public void unLockWrite()
        Unlock the KVServer for write operations.

      • update

        public void update(Metadata metadata)
        Update the metadata repository of this server

      • setMetadata

        public void setMetadata(Metadata metadata)

      • getID

        public int getID()
